review: *** ****** ****** ** ****** * **** **** ************* I am pretty much happy with her performance in terms of diagnosis and treatment. But the only objection I have towards the hospital is that they charged me 700 bucks for my second session in which I just wanted to show the blood test reports. What I was informed was that after 3 days of my primary consultation, I will be charged the regular fees again. But they have not mentioned it earlier. It seemed pointless. The rules and formalities should be even more considerate otherwise it causes complete despair in patients.

My appointment was fixed at 10.40 but was called to see the doctor only at 12.25. upon my inquiry I found that my file was placed at the bottom of other appointments. Because of which appointments schedules after mine got to meet the doctor prior to mine. It was totally bad management of the staff and poor attitude towards service. Except doctor the staff is not trained properly to manage patients and absolutely no co-ordination between them. God save patients if such mismanagement is carried out in operating rooms.

Went for general checkup for daughter, doc identified heart issue which was not identified in other reports when my daughter was just 2 months. Further checks confirmed her diagnosis. Thanks to her, surgery was done at right time *** ** ******** ** ********* **** ****

You book an appointment to discuss any health issue and general guidelines for babies health and development milestones .
My baby had red eyes due to some allergy . She gave anti- allergic drops. I want to talk about his health and development milestone in general . She said later. Why will i go to hospital to see doctor , if my kid is all healthy .
Very good intraction with related and gave good advices for resolve and clinic staff also very good coorperative

Doctor Anjana is very supportive both my kids problems get solved with Doctor Anjana she is nothing less than god to me ,her service is the best I would recommend all to visit doctor for any problems she gives **** treatment and always supports.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am showing my son since 13 years and my daughter since her birth (8 yrs). She will diagnose all the problem correctly . Very happy with her treatment.

4yr young. The doctor identified exact problem and treated *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My experience with Dr Anjana B Choudhary regarding my daughter's health issues. she listened very well, and explained to us about treatment and procedures very well. She has taken care my daughter very well.
Thank you Dr Anjana madam üôèüôèüôè

My son was admitted to Manipal hospital under her supervision for viral fever. After 4 days with lots of tests and various antibiotics and medication (even they had given steriod) ******* *** ******** * I left the hospital finally **** ***** ***** ***** by paying 93K bill . Later we took other doctor *** **** *** ********** ***** **********  The situation of pediatric ward of Manipal Hospital (old HAL Road) is woeful. Please avoid
